name: vega-loader
description: Network request and file loading utilities.

scripts.build: npm run test && uglifyjs build/vega-loader.js -c -m -o build/vega-loader.min.js
scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build&& rollup -f umd -g d3-dsv:d3,d3-time-format:d3,vega-util:vega,topojson-client:topojson -n vega -o build/vega-loader.js -- index.js
scripts.postpublish: git push && git push --tags && zip -j build/vega-loader.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/vega-loader.js build/vega-loader.min.js
